Key Arguments: The proposed legislation restricts the free flow of ideas and is unconstitutional.
ACMA is not a constitutionally recognized government organization and lacks the authority to propose or administer laws.
Historical examples show that laws against free speech lead to draconian societies and civil unrest.
There is skepticism about ACMA's ability to accurately determine misinformation and disinformation.
The legislation could lead to biased control over what is considered the truth.
The COVID-19 pandemic is cited as an example of the suppression of debate and the eventual emergence of concealed truths.
Notable Quotes: It is beyond belief that any government organization would propose legislation to restrict the free flow of ideas within society.
How does ACMA prove that it can be the inerrant arbiter of the truth by determining what is misinformation and disinformation in the public square?
We will never find truth unless there is vigorous and independent debate predicated on free speech.
